get_state()[source]¶

Get camera state.

Returns

-1

Camera State unknown

0 Camera idle 2 Camera is busy (exposing) 5 Camera error

set_frame(minx, miny, width, height)[source]¶

Set region of interest (ROI) for image capture.

Parameters

  • minx – Leftmost extent of ROI.

  • miny – Uppermost extent of ROI.

  • width – Width of ROI.

  • height – Height of ROI.

Returns

True on success.

Return type

bool
